facebook.title: Facebook integration
facebook.description: Allow consumers to use their Facebook account to register with one click and log in to your online store to become a member, without having to go through a complicated registration process, providing a convenient shopping experience
facebook.description-link: Why can't customers log in with Facebook?

toggle.title: Facebook login
toggle.description: Allow consumers to use their Facebook account to register with one click and log in to your online store to become a member, without having to go through a complicated registration process, providing a convenient shopping experience

sub-title.title: Facebook application
sub-title.tip: Register the Facebook Developers account and create an application to obtain the application information

koodata.title: Koo.live live sale small helper
koodata.description: Professional Facebook live auction tools to help you make live interaction and collection orders more easily

items.title: Koo.live account connection
items.description: Log in and connect to the account, transfer your product information to Koo.Live, Koo.Live will assist the item in live in live and transfer the shopping cart linkage for consumers.

line.title: LINE integration function
line.description: After setting up with your Line Developer account, serial LINE registration and login function
line.tooltip: How to enable Line Registration and Login

toggle.title: LINE registration and login
toggle.description: After enabling, you can use the LINE account one-click registration, log in to your online store to become a member, do not need to have a complicated registration program to provide a convenient shopping experience.

ecfit.title: ECFIT Third Party Logistics Service
ecfit.description: One-stop e-commerce logistics integration system offers a complete service including assisting the store in product delivery, and it needs to do linkage setting after signing a contract with ECFIT.

companyToken.title: Company token
companyToken.tip: Provided after signing a contract with ECFIT, set up with the company's English name abbreviation and Uniform Invoice Number.

apiKey.title: API encryption key
apiKey.tip: It can be generated in the back-end of the ECFIT system and copied and pasted here.

gaViewId.title: Google Analytics data read
gaViewId.description: You need to add the meepShop service account ID to the user in Google Analytics and enable the "View and Analysis" permission to read the data normally.

0.title: meepShop service account ID
0.tooltip: Add meepShop service account ID to user

1.title: Data view ID
1.tooltip: How to set up data view ID
1.caution: The smart conversion component can only be used after setting the data view ID. It is recommended not to change the settings during the component usage period to maintain data accuracy.
